entry.title: Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks. Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely. To mitigate risks somewha...
entry.summary: Re These kind of loans obviously come with significant risks. Revenues of DAO's are highly volatile & can dry up completely. To mitigate risks somewhat, the bonds are over-collateralized in governance tokens (in this case 250% LTV in $FOX).
